assetTransfer_qrScanInstructions: Scan a QR code of a Radix Account address from another wallet or an exchange.
assetTransfer_chooseReceivingAccount_ent: Enter or scan an Account address
assetTransfer_chooseReceivingAccount_cho: Or: Choose one of your own Accounts
assetTransfer_error_wrongNetwork: Address is not valid on current network
assetTransfer_error_insufficientBalance: Total amount exceeds your current balance
assetTransfer_maxAmountDialog_body: Sending the full amount of XRD in this account will require you to pay the transaction fee from a different account. Or, the wallet can reduce the amount transferred so the fee can be paid from this account. Choose the amount to transfer:
assetTransfer_maxAmountDialog_body2: Sending the full amount of XRD in this account will require you to pay the transaction fee from a different account.
assetTransfer_extraSignature_label: You will be asked for an extra signature
